summary: Question management app with a student section: remove the PDF upload section, display only manually added questions, preserve previously added questions across updates, and fix the student question view error (“Something went wrong”).
known_issues: Student section shows “Something went wrong” when opening a question.

existing_features.title: Remove the PDF upload/import section from Contributor mode and revert the Contributor UI to manual question creation/editing only (no PDF upload button, no PDF import tabs/mode, no extracted preview list, and no bulk-save flow).

Ensure the Student/Practice question view never shows the global “Something went wrong” error due to missing questions or invalid indices/IDs; instead, handle these cases gracefully with an English, user-friendly empty/error state and safe navigation back to selection pages.

Show only the questions the user/admin has added (i.e., do not display any PDF-import/extracted question set in Student views), aligned with the removal of PDF import; ensure question listing in student flows is based only on the persisted question set and does not include any transient extracted preview data.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the PDF upload section and revert UI to the previous state (no PDF upload).
Show only the questions that the admin/user manually added (exclude PDF-extracted/imported questions).
Ensure existing/old questions are not deleted on future updates (persist questions across releases/migrations).
Fix the student section error when opening a question (shows “Something went wrong”).

Fix the backend bulk question creation logic so that newly created question IDs returned by the bulk-create endpoint correspond exactly to the IDs actually stored in the questions map (preventing downstream 'question not found' / mismatch errors when opening questions).

Ensure that future deployments/upgrades do not delete previously created questions (and related core data like chapters) by preserving actor state across upgrades; update/introduce migration/upgrade handling as needed under the project’s conditional migration policy.

projectName: Remove PDF upload, keep existing questions across updates, and fix student question open error
